# Canasta Master Club

> A high-performance, competitive online Canasta platform featuring authentic rules, ELO-based matchmaking, and dual-timer anti-AFK systems.

## Core Game Mechanics
- [Rules](https://www.canastamaster.club/how-to-play): Explains Standard (Draw 2) vs. Easy (Draw 1) rulesets.
- [ELO System](https://www.canastamaster.club/rankings): Details on how margin-of-victory affects player ratings.
- [Timers](https://www.canastamaster.club/how-to-play#timers): Details on the 12-minute match bank and 60-second turn limit.

## Rules & Variations
- **2-Player Mode**: Players receive 15 cards each; individual play.
- **4-Player Mode**: Players receive 11 cards each; team-based play.
- **Going Out (Standard)**: Requires 2 Canastas and drawing 2 cards per turn.
- **Going Out (Easy)**: Requires 1 Canasta and drawing 1 card per turn.

## Competitive Fair Play
- **Anti-AFK**: 1-minute turn timer with automatic forfeit to prevent stalling.
- **Match Bank**: 12-minute total time pool per player/team.
- **ELO Penalties**: Forfeiting or disconnecting results in a 1.5x rating loss multiplier.
